base.title: Simon Büchi
base.dialogFooterBody: The information on this site is for general informational purposes only. All information on the site is provided in good faith, however we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability or completeness of any information on the site. Under no circumstance shall we have any liability to you for any loss or damage of any kind incured as as result of the use of the site or reliance on any information provided on the site. Your use of the site and reliance on any information of the site is solely at your own risk.
base.dialogFooterBody2: Diese Webseite hat keine Cookies, kein Analytics und kein Code von Drittparteien. Because privacy matters.
base.footerText1: Diese Webseite hat keine Cookies, kein Analytics und kein Code von Drittparteien.

start.title: Willkommen
start.paragraph1: Das ist die persönliche Webseite von Simon Büchi.
start.paragraph2: Diese Seite ist sowohl klassisch über buechi.name als auch per dezentraler Infrastruktur über simonbuechi.eth zugänglich.
start.a2: Like on most blockchains, a user is addressed via a public key which is secured by a private key.
start.a3: Ethereum Name Service aims to provide a decentralized domain name system. You can buy a .eth for a yearly fee, similar to other domain names.
start.a4: simonbuechi.eth is linked to my Ethereum address. It is also linked to a IPFS address.

about.title: In Kürze
about.body2: Alumnus der Universität St. Gallen (M.A.HSG in Marketing, Services and Communication Management).
about.body3: Habe bei Synpulse, Bearingpoint, Zuercher Kantonalbank und SWIC Digital gearbeitet.
about.body4: Zertifiziert in Avaloq, Financial Risk Manager (Part 1), Scrum, Six Sigma und Geringeres.
about.aboutSiteBody: Diese Webseite ist einerseits meine persönliche Visitenkarte, wo ich Informationen teile. Andererseits dient sie als Labor und Experimentierwiese für dezentrale Technologien.

wall.title: Meine Pinnwand
wall.description: Das ist eine Pinnwand, an welcher jed aus Urzeiten des Internet bekannte Pinnwand
wall.buttonWriteWallNote: Redirects to 3Box. You need to have an Ethereum account in order to leave a message on the wall.

projects.title: Projekte
projects.pactaDescription: My startup. Products for and built with the blockchain, using cryptocurrency Bitcoin and decentralized software platform Ethereum.
projects.pactaVoteDescription: Pacta Vote is a blockchain based voting tool for annual general meetings (AGM) and other types of assemblies. All polling is stored on the Ethereum blockchain.
projects.raisinpickerDescription: Raisin Picker is a personal knowledge management tool. It features tagging, rating and linking of content nodes. Using Apache Solr, a faceted search enables you to find content quickly. It is based on Drupal content management system and is available as open source.
projects.simonbuechiDescription: My work on this site. It is a create-react-app based site. Feel free to fork this site and build your own

offering.title: Meine Angebote und Fähigkeiten
offering.reachoutDescription: Ich freue mich auf deine Kontaktaufnahme

arts.title: Arts
arts.about: Find here my generative arts experiments.
arts.draftsAbout: Please note that artworks are generated ad hoc and adapt to your screen size. It is generally recommended to use at least a tablet-sized screen.
